design_philosophy.core_concept: A digital street party. Not a political website, but a movement hub. Vibrant, loud, optimistic, and radically loving.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Neo-Brutalist Pop. High contrast, bold borders, massive typography, and vibrant color floods.

usage_rules.headings: font-primary font-extrabold tracking-tight text-4xl md:text-6xl lg:text-7xl uppercase
usage_rules.subheadings: font-campaign tracking-wide text-xl md:text-2xl uppercase text-primary
usage_rules.body: font-primary font-medium text-base md:text-lg leading-relaxed text-foreground/90
usage_rules.nav_links: font-campaign text-lg tracking-widest uppercase hover:text-primary transition-colors

typography.import_instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fredoka+One&family=Poppins:wght@400;600;800&family=Bebas+Neue&display=swap');

usage_guide.sections: Alternate between White (#FFFFFF) and Pale Pink (#FDF5F9) or Lavender (#E6E6FA)

layout_and_grid.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for section padding.

grid_system.bento_hero: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-6 auto-rows-[minmax(180px,auto)]

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-pp-magenta text-white font-bold px-8 py-4 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-y-1 hover:shadow-none transition-all border-2 border-black uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-white text-black font-bold px-8 py-4 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-y-1 hover:shadow-none transition-all border-2 border-black uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.ghost: text-black font-bold hover:text-pp-magenta hover:underline decoration-wavy underline-offset-4

cards.style: bg-white rounded-3xl border-2 border-black p-6 shadow-[8px_8px_0px_0px_rgba(255,153,204,1)] hover:shadow-[12px_12px_0px_0px_rgba(255,20,147,1)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-2 border-black bg-white px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pp-magenta focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-none font-medium placeholder:text-gray-400

navigation.style: sticky top-4 z-50 mx-4 rounded-full border-2 border-black bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] px-6 py-3 flex items-center justify-between

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to avoid 'flatness'.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Use 'Love Beams' (gradients of Pink->Orange) as section dividers.
visual_enhancers.marquee: Use infinite scrolling text for announcements: 'SPREAD LOVE * PAPERBOY PRINCE * THE FUTURE IS NOW'
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows (box-shadow) instead of soft blurs. Direction: Bottom-Right.

landing_page.structure: Hero (Big Bold Text + Image) -> Marquee -> Feed Preview (Bento Grid) -> Action Call -> Footer
landing_page.key_element: The 'Join the Love Revolution' CTA must be massive.

shop_page.design: Showcase the Pink Hoodie as a 'Holy Grail' item. Use a countdown or 'Notify Me' form. Keep the Cart icon visible but empty.
shop_page.visual: Use the 'art_texture' as a background for the product card.

admin_dashboard.style: Control Room Grid (Mode B). Dense but readable.
admin_dashboard.colors: White background, Sidebar in Pale Pink (#FDF5F9). Active tabs in Magenta.

universal_guidelines_for_main_agent.file_extension: Use .jsx for React components (as per project constraints).
universal_guidelines_for_main_agent.animation: Use framer-motion for entrance animations (fade-up, stagger-children).
universal_guidelines_for_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the pink backgrounds. Use black text on pink, or white text on deep magenta.
universal_guidelines_for_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines_for_main_agent.code_style: Use functional components with hooks. Keep components small and composable.
